alert.note: Alert for Hampden; Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 12:39PM EST until December 19 at 5:49AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton MA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Massachusetts... Westfield River At Westfield affecting Hampden and Hampshire Counties. For the Westfield River...including Westfield...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Westfield River at Westfield. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 14.5 feet, Road closures may be required along Route 20 and Union Avenue. Flooding is expected to spread into the Westgate Shopping Center parking area. Flooding will also develop where the Little River and Powdermill Brook join the Westfield. Other smaller tributaries will experience flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM EST Monday the stage was 13.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 13.0 ft. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:30 AM EST Monday was 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.3 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening. late tonight at 1245 AM EST.
